transcripts.text: At Liberty University, our mission of training champions for Christ is our foundation and our purpose.  Our mission will never change, and we boldly pursue it as we show the world what it means to be champions for Christ.  We are more than scholars and athletes.  We are the creators, the innovators, the leaders, the builders, and the dreamers, and we know who we are in Christ.  We resolve to stand with integrity and to inspire others through our character and unwavering faith.  We are crossing state lines and even oceans to share the gospel.  We are passionately defending freedom in the field and healing the hurting in hospitals.  We are inspiring creativity in literature and art, and we are challenging perspectives in corporate boardrooms.  This is the community you are joining, and this is what we stand for.  At Liberty University, we train in our craft to be ready, hearts expectant for when Christ calls us into action.  We the champions have a vision to change the world, and that vision starts with you.  Welcome to Liberty University, where we train champions for Christ.  Peace.
